  • Method Details

    • receiveCoin

      public void receiveCoin()
      Gives a coin to the player.

    • useAssistant

      public void useAssistant(Assistant assistantToBePlayed) throws InvalidParameterException
      Uses the received Assistant and, if it can be played, updates lastAssistantPlayed and removes it from the deck.
      Parameters:
      assistantToBePlayed - Is the specific Assistant that the player wants to play in this round.
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - If assistantToBePlayed isn't in the assistantsDeck.

    • useCharacter

      public void useCharacter(Character character, Option option) throws CharacterImpossibleToPlay
      Uses the received Character if there are enough coins. It updates the number of coins.
      Parameters:
      character - The Character that the player wants to play.
      option - The parameters that are needed in order to play the Character.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there aren't enough coins to play the Character.
      CharacterImpossibleToPlay

    • createDeck

      public void createDeck(WizardTeam team) throws InstanceAlreadyExistsException
      It creates the Assistant deck from the Wizard Team received from parameters and sets the team as the team received from parameter.
      Parameters:
      team - The Wizard Team to which the deck belongs.
      Throws:
      InstanceAlreadyExistsException - if an instance of the assistantDeck is already present.

    • getLastAssistantPlayed

      public Assistant getLastAssistantPlayed()
      Returns:
      It returns the lastAssistantPlayed.

      Parameters:
      board - The board controlled by the Player.
